subject_options: Arnos Bistrot — making your 4.9 rating work harder
One small change to surface your Google reviews
Arnos Bistrot — your reviews deserve more visibility
email_body:
I came across Arnos Bistrot while looking at restaurants in Westport and wanted to get in touch.

A 4.9 Google rating across 293 reviews is genuinely exceptional — one of the strongest profiles I have seen for a restaurant in the area. Right now those reviews are displayed manually on the site rather than embedded dynamically, which means they require ongoing effort to keep current and carry less weight with new visitors than live Google Reviews would.

I help hospitality businesses in the west of Ireland make small, high-impact improvements to how their reputation shows up online. Embedding your reviews dynamically, adding a click-to-call button on mobile, and implementing local schema markup is typically a fixed-scope project completed in under two weeks.

I can put together a one-page outline of exactly what this would include and what it would cost — happy to send that over if it would be useful?

Best regards
[Your name]
